text: Nza mba hɨr zav mbui bigi ga ndɨkndɨgap, nza zazera nde nzuav, nza won Fhe Bakɨme phorga nzuav, anan nzai, ana nden kurkurarga. Nza khueŋ vuzvugi, nde guigira ana muun zav nden kamgi tɨvi, nde ntan muunga. Nza ana ŋkasŋkar nden nɨɨn zav, nza ne nzuav ana phorga nzuai. Nde ana khothɨgi ndɨkndɨk nde ndavi khavɨrim, nde mba muun zav mbui tɨvir vhuuiŋ, nde zam ntan muunga.
